Thank you for your participating in the eMERGE study. To continue your participation, please complete the consent form using the link below. If you have previously started the consent, it will ask for the your first name, last name and date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format. We have included these at the top of your email for your convenience.
We are very appreciative of your time and dedication to our study. Please do not hesitate to reach out with questions.

Thank you for participating in the eMERGE study. To continue your participation, please complete the survey below. It takes about 15-18 minutes to complete. If you have previously started the survey, it will ask for the your first name, last name and date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format. We have included these at the top of your email for your convenience
We are very appreciative of your time and dedication to our study. Please do not hesitate to reach out with questions.

You have the following steps remaining in this study
&bull
column2: Complete a baseline and medical history survey
Provide a saliva or blood sample (You will receive a separate email and a $20 Amazon gift card)
Complete information about your family history (You will receive a separate email and a $20 Amazon gift card)
Receive the results (about 6-9 months after you provide the sample)
Complete the post results survey (You will receive a $20 Amazon gift card)

Thank you for participating in the eMERGE study. To continue your participation, please complete the consent form using the link below. If you have previously started the consent, it will ask for the your first name, last name and date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format. We have included these at the top of your email for your convenience. The link will remain active for 2 weeks. After 2 weeks have passed, you will need to restart the consent.
We are very appreciative of your time and dedication to our study. Please do not hesitate to reach out with questions.
